document.full_text: if gov. paul lepage does not want to display a mural depicting the state's labor history, then the federal money used to create it should be returned, the united states department of labor says.
document.title: new england: maine: u.s. wants money back after governor removes mural
lines_and_colors: if gov. paul lepage does not want to display a mural depicting the state's labor history, then the federal money used to create it should be returned, the united states department of labor says.
